snippet.title: Sisu: Road to Revenge (2025) 4K - Brutal Train Slaughter | Movieclips
snippet.description:
Sisu 2 - Brutal Barrack Slaughter: Korpi (Jorma Tommila) guns his way through the Red Army's footsoldiers.
BUY THE MOVIE: https://athome.fandango.com/content/browse/details/Sisu-Road-to-Revenge/4743588?cmp=Movieclips_YT_Description 
More Ways to Watch: https://www.rottentomatoes.com/m/sisu_road_to_revenge#where-to-watch?cmp=Movieclips_YT_Description
 
Watch the best Sisu 2 scenes & clips: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLZbXA4lyCtqq9VHF1n47woR0s7kqfckwm

Subscribe and click the bell to be notified of all your favorite movie scenes: http://bit.ly/2CZa490 

► Download the Rotten Tomatoes app: https://bit.ly/4lcQqHs
 
FILM DESCRIPTION: 
Korpi dismantles the house where his family was murdered and loads it on a truck to rebuild it somewhere safe. He soon finds himself in a violent cross-country chase as the Red Army commander who killed his family comes back to finish the job. 
 
CREDITS:
TM & © Screen Gems (2025)
Cast: Jorma Tommila, Stephen Lang
Director: Jalmari Helander
Screenwriter: Jalmari Helander
